response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, and I am eager to share its potential benefits with you.

Considering the exceptional quality and capabilities of this item, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $1,200,000. This price reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer who will appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide all the necessary information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
